00012 // BOOST

00015 namespace cupp {
00016 namespace kernel_impl {
00017 
00028 template <int arirty>
00029 class test_dirty {
00034         template <typename F>
00035         static std::vector<bool> dirty ();
00036 };
00037 
00038 
00039 template <>
00040 class test_dirty<3> {
00041         template <typename F>
00042         static std::vector<bool> dirty ();
00043         
00044         template <typename T>
00045         friend class kernel_launcher_impl;
00046         
00047         template <typename T>
00048         friend std::vector<bool> test_dirty<4>::dirty();
00049 };
00050 
00051 template <>
00052 class test_dirty<2> {
00053         template <typename F>
00054         static std::vector<bool> dirty ();
00055         
00056         template <typename T>
00057         friend class kernel_launcher_impl;
00058         
00059         template <typename T>
00060         friend std::vector<bool> test_dirty<3>::dirty();
00061 };
00062

00064 class test_dirty<1> {
00065         template <typename F>
00066         static std::vector<bool> dirty ();
00067         
00068         template <typename T>
00069         friend class kernel_launcher_impl;
00070

00075 template <>

00077         template <typename F>
00078         static std::vector<bool> dirty ();
00079

00081         friend class kernel_launcher_impl;
00082

00088 /*** IMPLEMENTATION ***/
00089 
00093 template <typename ARG>
00094 inline bool check_arg() {
00095         if (boost::is_reference<ARG>::value && !is_second_level_const<ARG>::value) {
00096                 return true;
00097         }
00098         
00099         return false;
00100 }
00101 
00102 template <typename F>
00103 std::vector<bool> test_dirty<0>::dirty () {
00104         return std::vector<bool>();
00105 }
00106 
00107 template <typename F>
00108 std::vector<bool> test_dirty<1>::dirty () {
00109         typedef typename boost::function_traits<F>::arg1_type ARG;
00110         
00111         std::vector< bool > tmp(test_dirty<0>::dirty<F>());
00112         tmp.push_back (check_arg<ARG>());
00113         return tmp;
00114 }
00115 
00116 template <typename F>
00117 std::vector<bool> test_dirty<2>::dirty () {
00118         typedef typename boost::function_traits<F>::arg2_type ARG;
00119         
00120         std::vector< bool > tmp(test_dirty<1>::dirty<F>());
00121         tmp.push_back (check_arg<ARG>());
00122         return tmp;
00123 }
00124 
00125 template <typename F>
00126 std::vector<bool> test_dirty<3>::dirty () {
00127         typedef typename boost::function_traits<F>::arg3_type ARG;
00128         
00129         std::vector< bool > tmp(test_dirty<2>::dirty<F>() );
00130         tmp.push_back (check_arg<ARG>());
00131         return tmp;
00132 }
